addCollectionWatchersToSubitemsOf (addCollectionWatchersToSubitemsOf.html)

Adds watchers to each item in the model to perform the "post" when something there changes.

Paramaters

  • model { string } - The model to watch.
  • scope { object } - The scope where the model belongs to.
  • resourceName { string } - The "singular" version of the model as used by sailsjs.
  • prefix { string } - The api prefix to use.
  • scopeProperty { string } - The scope property to bind to
